items.title: Inside Christian Louboutin’s Portuguese Beach Compound
items.abstract: The designer gives T a tour of his colorful vacation home on a secluded stretch of Atlantic coastline.

items.title: Hospitals in Coastal Cities Risk Flooding Even in ‘Weak’ Hurricanes, Study Finds
items.abstract: In a third of the 78 cities examined on the Atlantic and Gulf coasts, half or more of hospitals were at risk from a Category 2 storm, the researchers said.

items.title: Billions in Climate Deal Funding Could Help Protect U.S. Coastal Cities
items.abstract: Communities across the country hope to tap into funds from Democrats’ new climate law to restore coastal habitats, part of a program that emphasizes nature-based solutions.

items.title: Libya Rebels Capture Key Coastal City in Threat to U.N.-Backed Government
items.abstract: The fall of Surt comes as foreign powers intensify their involvement in the conflict, escalating the battle for control of the country.

items.title: A Small Palace as Family Home in Coastal Suburban Lisbon
items.abstract: Fourteen miles east of the Portuguese capital, a fanciful five-bedroom, stone-covered house dating from 1899 combines the elegant and the rustic.
